name: tag
description: The html tag being used to render this card.

name: title
description: The title for the default card header. Don't provide one if you fill the 'header' slot yourself.

name: titleTag
description: The html tag being used to render the title of this card.

name: logoUrl
description: The url of the logo to be rendered in the header of this card.

name: headerClass
description: The classes to be applied on the card header
type: string | string[] | Record<string, boolean> | Record<string, boolean>[]

name: bodyClass
description: The classes to be applied on the card body.
type: string | string[] | Record<string, boolean> | Record<string, boolean>[]

name: footerClass
description: The classes to be applied on the card footer.
type: string | string[] | Record<string, boolean> | Record<string, boolean>[]
